about.title: What is SorteoHub?
about.description1: SorteoHub is a professional digital platform that allows you to create, manage and sell raffles online in an automated and transparent way. Unlike traditional paper raffles, our system gives you complete control over sales, real-time ticket validation, transparent winner selection and complete management of participants and payments.
about.description2: Designed specifically for organizers looking to professionalize their non-profit raffles, SorteoHub allows you to monetize products, services or special events without the limitations of physical format, with unlimited geographic reach and advanced management tools.

entrepreneurs.title: Entrepreneurs
entrepreneurs.description: Monetize products or services through non-profit raffles.

businesses.title: Small and Medium Businesses
businesses.description: Increase engagement with your customers through promotional raffles.

professionals.title: Professional Organizers
professionals.description: Manage raffles as a main activity with professional tools.

customizable.title: Customizable Raffles
customizable.description: Create raffles with the number of tickets you need. From quick 100-ticket raffles to massive draws of thousands. Participants select their favorite numbers in real time.

multipleTypes.title: Multiple Raffle Types
multipleTypes.description: Not just numbers. Create raffles with cards, alphabet, animals, colors, sports teams, emojis and more. Each raffle can have multiple prizes with photos.

securePayments.title: Secure Payments with Stripe
securePayments.description: Payments processed securely by Stripe. Participants pay by card and money is automatically transferred to the bank account you register when creating your raffle. Fast, secure and reliable process.

transparency.title: Total Transparency
transparency.description: Publish the winning number transparently. Participants can verify if they won. Live draws with witnesses to ensure total transparency.

management.title: Complete Management
management.description: Control participants, payments, sold tickets and real-time statistics. Access complete reports on sales and participant database.

unlimitedReach.title: Unlimited Reach
unlimitedReach.description: Sell tickets to people anywhere in the country or internationally without needing to be physically present. Eliminates geographic barriers.

reduceCosts.title: Reduces Costs
reduceCosts.description: Eliminates printing, distribution and cash collection expenses. Everything is managed digitally.

credibility.title: Greater Credibility
credibility.description: A professional system conveys seriousness. Participants trust transparent and automated platforms more.

scalable.title: Scalable
scalable.description: Create multiple raffles simultaneously, manage hundreds or thousands of tickets and scale according to demand.

totalControl.title: Total Control
totalControl.description: Complete visibility from your panel: sales, payments, statistics and participants. Make informed decisions easily.

register.title: Sign Up
register.description: Create your free account in seconds and verify your identity.

create.title: Create your Raffle
create.description: Set up prizes, rules, dates and payment methods easily.

share.title: Share
share.description: Send the link to your participants and manage sales.

draw.title: Conduct the Draw
draw.description: Do the live draw with witnesses and deliver the prizes.

cta.title: Ready to create your first raffle?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of organizers who already trust SorteoHub

advertisersSection.title: Have a Business?
advertisersSection.subtitle: Promote your products and services to thousands of active raffle participants. Reach your ideal audience with precise targeting and measurable results.

footer.productOf: SorteoHub is a product of AureLA Solutions
